content: 64 sts total continue knitting following double fleck stitch pattern on needles 2 & 3 until foot is desired length leaving about 2 for the toe decrease ttooee ddeeccrreeaassee decrease round 1 *knit 6 k2tog pm repeat from * to end knit 2 rounds even decrease round 2 *knit to 2 stitches before marker k2tog repeat from * to end knit 2 rounds even repeat decrease round 2 until 8 stitches remain sew tail through remaining stitches and cinch closed
